verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered אֱלִיה֗וּא <S%H453><s%> Furthermore Elihu וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

שִׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear חֲכָמִ֣ים <S%H2450><s%> O ye wise מִלָּ֑י <S%H4405><s%> my words וְ֝יֹדְעִ֗ים <S%H3045><s%> unto me ye that have knowledge הַאֲזִ֥ינוּ <S%H238><s%> [men] and give ear לִֽי׃

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אֹ֭זֶן <S%H241><s%> For the ear מִלִּ֣ין <S%H4405><s%> words תִּבְחָ֑ן <S%H974><s%> trieth וְ֝חֵ֗ךְ <S%H2441><s%> as the mouth יִטְעַ֥ם <S%H2938><s%> tasteth לֶאֱכֹֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> meat

מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> to us judgment נִבְחֲרָה־ <S%H977><s%> Let us choose לָּ֑נוּ נֵדְעָ֖ה <S%H3045><s%> let us know בֵינֵ֣ינוּ <S%H996><s%> among מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what טּֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> among ourselves what [is] good

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָ֭מַר <S%H559><s%> hath said אִיּ֣וֹב <S%H347><s%> For Job צָדַ֑קְתִּי <S%H6663><s%> I am righteous וְ֝אֵ֗ל <S%H410><s%> and God הֵסִ֥יר <S%H5493><s%> hath taken away מִשְׁפָּטִֽי׃ <S%H4941><s%> my judgment

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning מִשְׁפָּטִ֥י <S%H4941><s%> adversary אֲכַזֵּ֑ב <S%H3576><s%> Should I lie אָנ֖וּשׁ <S%H605><s%> [is] incurable חִצִּ֣י <S%H2671><s%> archer בְלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> without פָֽשַׁע׃ <S%H6588><s%> without transgression
מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> What גֶ֥בֶר <S%H1397><s%> What man כְּאִיּ֑וֹב <S%H347><s%> [is] like Job יִֽשְׁתֶּה־ <S%H8354><s%> [who] drinketh up לַּ֥עַג <S%H3933><s%> scorning כַּמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> water

וְאָרַ֣ח <S%H732><s%> Which goeth לְ֭חֶבְרָה <S%H2274><s%> in company עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> with the workers אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> of iniquity וְ֝לָלֶ֗כֶת <S%H1980><s%> and walks עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H376><s%> with רֶֽשַׁע׃ <S%H7562><s%> with wicked

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָ֭מַר <S%H559><s%> For he hath said לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nothing יִסְכָּן־ <S%H5532><s%> It profiteth גָּ֑בֶר <S%H1397><s%> a man בִּ֝רְצֹת֗וֹ <S%H7521><s%> nothing that he should delight עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> himself with God

לָכֵ֤ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore אַ֥נֲשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> men לֵבָ֗ב <S%H3824><s%> of understanding שִׁמְע֫וּ <S%H8085><s%> Therefore hearken לִ֥י חָלִ֖לָה <S%H2486><s%> far be it לָאֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> from God מֵרֶ֗שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> [that he should do] wickedness וְשַׁדַּ֥י <S%H7706><s%> and [from] the Almighty מֵעָֽוֶל׃ <S%H5766><s%> [that he should commit] iniquity

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> according פֹ֣עַל <S%H6467><s%> For the work אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> of a man יְשַׁלֶּם־ <S%H7999><s%> shall he render ל֑וֹ וּֽכְאֹ֥רַח <S%H734><s%> according to [his] ways אִ֝֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto him and cause every man יַמְצִאֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4672><s%> to find

אַף־ <S%H637><s%> Yea אָמְנָ֗ם <S%H551><s%> Yea surely אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> God לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יַרְשִׁ֑יעַ <S%H7561><s%> will not do wickedly וְ֝שַׁדַּ֗י <S%H7706><s%> neither will the Almighty לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יְעַוֵּ֥ת <S%H5791><s%> pervert מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> judgment

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who פָקַ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> Who hath given him a charge עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> over אָ֑רְצָה <S%H776><s%> common וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who שָׂ֝֗ם <S%H7760><s%> has laid תֵּבֵ֥ל <S%H8398><s%> confusion כֻּלָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3605><s%> the whole

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יָשִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> If he set אֵלָ֣יו <S%H413><s%> about לִבּ֑וֹ <S%H3820><s%> his heart רוּח֥וֹ <S%H7307><s%> unto himself his spirit וְ֝נִשְׁמָת֗וֹ <S%H5397><s%> and his breath אֵלָ֥יו <S%H413><s%> to יֶאֱסֹֽף׃ <S%H622><s%> upon man [if] he gather

יִגְוַ֣ע <S%H1478><s%> shall perish כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All בָּשָׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> All flesh יָ֑חַד <S%H3162><s%> together וְ֝אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> and man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto עָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> unto dust יָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> shall turn again

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if בִּ֥ינָה <S%H998><s%> If now [thou hast] understanding שִׁמְעָה־ <S%H8085><s%> hear זֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הַ֝אֲזִ֗ינָה <S%H238><s%> this hearken לְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> to the voice מִלָּֽי׃ <S%H4405><s%> of my words

הַאַ֬ף <S%H637><s%> yet שׂוֹנֵ֣א <S%H8130><s%> Shall even he that hateth מִשְׁפָּ֣ט <S%H4941><s%> right יַחֲב֑וֹשׁ <S%H2280><s%> govern וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo צַדִּ֖יק <S%H6662><s%> the righteous כַּבִּ֣יר <S%H3524><s%> him that is most תַּרְשִֽׁיעַ׃ <S%H7561><s%> ? and wilt thou condemn
הַאֲמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> [Is it fit] to say לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to a king בְּלִיָּ֑עַל <S%H1100><s%> Worthless רָ֝שָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> Wicked אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about נְדִיבִֽים׃ <S%H5081><s%> free

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no נָשָׂ֨א ׀ <S%H5375><s%> [How much less to him] that accepteth פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> not the persons שָׂרִ֗ים <S%H8269><s%> of princes וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor נִכַּר־ <S%H5234><s%> nor regardeth שׁ֭וֹעַ <S%H7771><s%> the rich לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> more than דָ֑ל <S%H1800><s%> the poor כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> are the work יָדָ֣יו <S%H3027><s%> of his hands כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

רֶ֤גַע ׀ <S%H7281><s%> In a moment יָמֻתוּ֮ <S%H4191><s%> shall they die וַחֲצ֪וֹת <S%H2676><s%> mid לָ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> night יְגֹעֲשׁ֣וּ <S%H1607><s%> shall be troubled עָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people וְיַעֲבֹ֑רוּ <S%H5674><s%> and pass away וְיָסִ֥ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> shall be taken away אַ֝בִּ֗יר <S%H47><s%> and the mighty לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> without בְיָֽד׃ <S%H3027><s%> without hand

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For עֵ֭ינָיו <S%H5869><s%> For his eyes עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are upon דַּרְכֵי־ <S%H1870><s%> [are] upon the ways אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of man וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צְעָדָ֥יו <S%H6806><s%> all his goings יִרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> and he seeth

אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> There חֹ֭שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> [There is] no darkness וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is no צַלְמָ֑וֶת <S%H6757><s%> nor shadow of death לְהִסָּ֥תֶר <S%H5641><s%> may hide שָׁ֝֗ם <S%H8033><s%> Where פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> where the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> of iniquity

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אִ֭ישׁ <S%H376><s%> upon man יָשִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> For he will not lay ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> further לַהֲלֹ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> more [than right] that he should enter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> before אֵ֝֗ל <S%H410><s%> with God בַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> into judgment

יָרֹ֣עַ <S%H7489><s%> He shall break in pieces כַּבִּירִ֣ים <S%H3524><s%> mighty men לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> without חֵ֑קֶר <S%H2714><s%> without number וַיַּעֲמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> and set אֲחֵרִ֣ים <S%H312><s%> others תַּחְתָּֽם׃ <S%H8478><s%> their place

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יַ֭כִּיר <S%H5234><s%> Therefore he knoweth מַעְבָּֽדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H4566><s%> their works וְהָ֥פַךְ <S%H2015><s%> and he overturneth לַ֝֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> [them] in the night וְיִדַּכָּֽאוּ׃ <S%H1792><s%> so that they are destroyed
תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> them as רְשָׁעִ֥ים <S%H7563><s%> wicked men סְפָקָ֗ם <S%H5606><s%> He striketh בִּמְק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in the open רֹאִֽים׃ <S%H7200><s%> sight

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֭ן <S%H3651><s%> after that סָ֣רוּ <S%H5493><s%> Because they turned back מֵֽאַחֲרָ֑יו <S%H310><s%> from him וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any דְּ֝רָכָ֗יו <S%H1870><s%> any of his ways לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no הִשְׂכִּֽילוּ׃ <S%H7919><s%> and would not consider

לְהָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> to come עָ֭לָיו <S%H5921><s%> and צַֽעֲקַת־ <S%H6818><s%> So that they cause the cry דָּ֑ל <S%H1800><s%> of the poor וְצַעֲקַ֖ת <S%H6818><s%> the cry עֲנִיִּ֣ים <S%H6041><s%> of the afflicted יִשְׁמָֽע׃ <S%H8085><s%> unto him and he heareth

וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יַשְׁקִ֨ט ׀ <S%H8252><s%> When he giveth quietness וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> who יַרְשִׁ֗עַ <S%H7561><s%> who then can make trouble וְיַסְתֵּ֣ר <S%H5641><s%> ? and when he hideth פָּ֭נִים <S%H6440><s%> [his] face וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who יְשׁוּרֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7789><s%> who then can behold וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> regard גּ֖וֹי <S%H1471><s%> him? whether [it be done] against a nation וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> regard אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> or against a man יָֽחַד׃ <S%H3162><s%> only

מִ֭מְּלֹךְ <S%H4427><s%> reign אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> men חָנֵ֗ף <S%H2611><s%> godless מִמֹּ֥קְשֵׁי <S%H4170><s%> be ensnared עָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> not lest the people כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to

אֵ֭ל <S%H410><s%> unto God הֶאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> Surely it is meet to be said נָשָׂ֗אתִי <S%H5375><s%> I have borne לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶחְבֹּֽל׃ <S%H2254><s%> [chastisement] I will not offend

בִּלְעֲדֵ֣י <S%H1107><s%> not אֶ֭חֱזֶה <S%H2372><s%> [That which] I see אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you הֹרֵ֑נִי <S%H3384><s%> teach אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> If עָ֥וֶל <S%H5766><s%> iniquity פָּ֝עַ֗לְתִּי <S%H6466><s%> thou me if I have done לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֹסִֽיף׃ <S%H3254><s%> I will do

הַֽמֵעִמְּךָ֬ <S%H5973><s%> your terms יְשַׁלְמֶ֨נָּה <S%H7999><s%> [Should it be] according to thy mind? he will recompense כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because מָאַ֗סְתָּ <S%H3988><s%> have rejected כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you תִבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> or whether thou choose וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> I וּֽמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יָדַ֥עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> what thou knowest דַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> and not I therefore speak

אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> Let men לֵ֭בָב <S%H3824><s%> of understanding יֹ֣אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> tell לִ֑י וְגֶ֥בֶר <S%H1397><s%> man חָ֝כָ֗ם <S%H2450><s%> me and let a wise שֹׁמֵ֥עַֽ <S%H8085><s%> hearken לִֽי׃

אִ֭יּוֹב <S%H347><s%> Job לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> without בְדַ֣עַת <S%H1847><s%> without knowledge יְדַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken וּ֝דְבָרָ֗יו <S%H1697><s%> and his words לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> are without בְהַשְׂכֵּֽיל׃ <S%H7919><s%> [were] without wisdom

אָבִ֗י <S%H15><s%> desire יִבָּחֵ֣ן <S%H974><s%> may be tried אִיּ֣וֹב <S%H347><s%> [is that] Job עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against נֶ֑צַח <S%H5331><s%> unto the end עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Because תְּ֝שֻׁבֹ֗ת <S%H8666><s%> because of [his] answers בְּאַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H376><s%> men אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> for wicked

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יֹ֘סִ֤יף <S%H3254><s%> For he addeth עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto חַטָּאת֣וֹ <S%H2403><s%> unto his sin פֶ֭שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> rebellion בֵּינֵ֣ינוּ <S%H996><s%> among יִסְפּ֑וֹק <S%H5606><s%> he clappeth וְיֶ֖רֶב <S%H7235><s%> [his hands] among us and multiplieth אֲמָרָ֣יו <S%H561><s%> his words לָאֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> against God ס
